SOSServiceElement.Author: Bryan and Katie Torwalt
SOSServiceElement.Verse1: There’s nothing worth more that will ever come close No thing can compare You’re our living hope Your Presence Lord
SOSServiceElement.Verse2: I’ve tasted and seen of the sweetest of loves Where my heart becomes free And my shame is undone Your Presence Lord
SOSServiceElement.Chorus1: Holy Spirit You are welcome here Come flood this place and fill the atmosphere Your Glory God is what our hearts long for To be overcome by Your Presence Lord
SOSServiceElement.Bridge1:
Let us become more aware of Your Presence
Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness
SOSServiceElement.Bridge2:
Let us become more aware of Your Presence
Let us experience the Glory of Your Goodness
